summary: This bill, the "Clarifying Legal Exclusions Around Regulated Waters Act" (CLEAR Waters Act), amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act. It aims to define what constitutes "navigable waters" by excluding certain features from the definition. Specifically, it excludes components of waste treatment systems, ephemeral features that only flow after precipitation, and groundwater. It also allows the Administrator and the Secretary of the Army to exclude other features.
